meanings.definition: Represented in a cartoon or animated form.
meanings.sent1: The cartooned characters on the screen made the children laugh.
meanings.sent2: The cartooned animals looked so colorful and fun.
meanings.sent3: The cartooned birds were singing and dancing in the forest.
meanings.sent4: Her cartooned world was full of magic and wonder.
meanings.sent5: The cartooned landscape was like a dream come to life.

meanings.definition: To draw or create a cartoon.
meanings.sent1: She cartooned a funny story about a mischievous cat.
meanings.sent2: He cartooned a superhero with incredible powers.
meanings.sent3: The artist cartooned a hilarious scene of a clumsy waiter.
meanings.sent4: They cartooned the political situation in a clever way.
meanings.sent5: I cartooned my family members as quirky characters in my comic strip.
